metadata.title: CVE-2021-31872 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in klibc before 2.0.9. Multiple possible integeroverflows in the cpio command on 32-bit systems may result in a bufferoverflow or other security impact.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-31872` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

klibc-utils - 2.0.4-8ubuntu1.16.04.4+esm1
libklibc - 2.0.4-8ubuntu1.16.04.4+esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: klibc package in esm-infra/xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.0.4-8ubuntu1.16.04.4+esm1').
